'''Leavanny''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ハハコモリ''' ''Hahakomori'') is a dual-type {{2t|Bug|Grass}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] from {{p|Swadloon}} when [[level]]ed up with high [[friendship]]. It is the final form of {{p|Sewaddle}}.

==Biology==
Leavanny is a thin, yellow, bipedal insectoid Pokémon. It has a broad, split leaf around its large, round head and it has long antennae that end in semicircles. Its eyes are red with no apparent sclera. Its tiny {{wp|thorax}} is dark green, and its long abdomen is yellow and covered in a green leaf. Its hands are long and leaf-like with a "bite" taken out of each. Its upper arms are also leaf-like, but with a vein of yellow at the top. Its thin legs are yellow with dark green, thick segments around its upper legs, making them appear armored.

Leavanny lives in forests. It is very parental and uses its cutters and a sticky silk it produces to create clothing made of leaves for small Pokémon. It also warms its eggs with fermenting fallen leaves.

==In the anime==
===In the main series===
[[File:Ash Leavanny.png|250px|thumb|left|Leavanny in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
====Major appearances====
=====[[Ash's Leavanny]]=====
{{Ash}}'s Swadloon evolved into Leavanny in ''[[BW074|Battling the Leaf Thieves!]]''.

=====Other=====
Leavanny appeared in ''[[BW018|Sewaddle and Burgh in Pinwheel Forest!]]'', under the ownership of [[Burgh]]. It reappeared in a Gym battle against Ash in ''[[BW023|Battling For The Love of Bug-Types!]]'', where it defeated Ash's Swadloon but was eventually defeated by {{AP|Pikachu}}.

[[Luke]]'s Leavanny appeared in ''[[BW038|Movie Time! Zorua in "The Legend of the Pokémon Knight"!]]''. It would help him create costumes for the film, and was once assisted by Ash's Swadloon. Luke's Leavanny reappeared in ''[[BW082|An Epic Defense Force!]]'', where it played a part of Luke's latest movie.

====Minor appearances====
A Leavanny made a cameo appearance in ''[[BW067|Cilan Takes Flight!]]''.

A Leavanny appeared in ''[[M15|Kyurem VS. The Sword of Justice]]'', during the {{OBP|Swords of Justice|M15}} legend.

[[Dino]] owns a Leavanny, which appeared in ''[[BW108|A Unova League Evolution!]]'' on the scoreboard of the [[Full Battle]]s in his battle against [[Katharine]].

A Leavanny appeared in a flashback in ''[[BW112|Team Plasma's Pokémon Power Plot!]]''.

==Trivia==
===Origin===
Leavanny has the characteristics of several insects. Primarily it appears to be bipedal {{wp|Phylliidae}}, like its prevolutions, is also based on the ''{{wp|Epargyreus clarus}}'' {{wp|caterpillar}} and {{wp|weaver ants}}. Its leafy "dress", "collar", and "paned sleeve" arms may be based on {{wp|1600–50 in Western European fashion|fashion in the early 1600s}}. Because of the way it acts towards smaller Pokémon and its baby {{p|Sewaddle}}, it could also be based on a human {{wp|mother}}. Its general body structure is also similar to that of a ''{{wp|Choeradodis}}'' {{wp|mantis}}, which also have laterally expanded thoraxes and abdomens.

====Name origin====
Leavanny is a combination of ''leaves'' and ''nanny''. It may also derive from ''{{wp|Levana}}'', the ancient Roman goddess of newborn babies.

Hahakomori may be a combination of 葉 ''ha'' (leaf), 母 ''haha'' (mother), and 子守 ''komori'' (babysitting).
